snippet: If Amazon entices even a fraction of its 250 million customers, it could accelerate already intense competition with retailers and tech companies.
abstract: Amazon unveils Fire smartphone, device that tries to fulfill retailer's dream of being integrated into consumers' lives at every possible waking moment; phone could accelerate company's already intense competition with other retailers and tech companies if it can convince even small portion of its 250 million active customers to buy one.
lead_paragraph: If Amazon entices even a fraction of its 250 million customers, it could accelerate already intense competition with retailers and tech companies.

headline.main: Fire Phone Immerses Users in Amazon’s World
headline.print_headline: Fire Phone Immerses Users in Amazon’s World
